violations.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
violations.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: <button class="cky-btn cky-btn-accept" aria-label="Godta" data-cky-tag="accept-button" style="color: #fafafa; border-color: #28A745; background-color: #28A745;">Godta</button>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3 (foreground color: #fafafa, background color: #28a745, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.html: <input name="q" class="js-finder-search-query uk-search-input" placeholder="Søk" required="" aria-label="Søk" type="search" autocomplete="off" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="awesomplete_list_2" role="combobox">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.87 (foreground color: #f7e6e6, background color: #dc2f2f, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.98 (foreground color: #b8b8b8, background color: #ffffff, font size: 13.5pt (18px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:

  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty

  Element has no title attribute

violations.description: Ensure the banner landmark is at top level
violations.help: Banner landmark should not be contained in another landmark
